name: String handling
desc: String is basically an object that represents sequence of char values. An array of characters works same as Java string

name: Collection framework
desc: The Collection in Java is a framework that provides an architecture to store and manipulate the group of objects.

name: Multithreading
desc: Multithreading in Java is a process of executing multiple threads simultaneously.

name: Exception handling
desc: The Exception Handling in Java is one of the powerful mechanism to handle the runtime errors so that normal flow of the application can be maintained.

name: Generics
desc: The Java Generics programming is introduced in J2SE 5 to deal with type-safe objects. It makes the code stable by detecting the bugs at compile time.

name: Synchronisation
desc: Synchronization in java is the capability to control the access of multiple threads to any shared resource.

name: Serialisation
desc: Serialization in Java is a mechanism of writing the state of an object into a byte-stream. It is mainly used in Hibernate, RMI, JPA, EJB and JMS technologies.

name: De-serialisation
desc: Deserialization is the process of reconstructing the object from the serialized state. It is the reverse operation of serialization
